original_text: And the servants of the king of Syria said unto him, Their gods are gods of the hills; therefore they were stronger than we; but let us fight against them in the plain, and surely we shall be stronger than they.
korean_text: 아람 왕의 신하들이 왕께 아뢰되 그들의 신은 산의 신이므로 그들이 우리보다 강하였거니와 우리가 만일 평지에서 그들과 싸우면 반드시 그들보다 강할지라

sentences.original_text: And the servants of the king of Syria said unto him,
Their gods are gods of the hills;
therefore they were stronger than we;
but let us fight against them in the plain,
and surely we shall be stronger than they.
